text: The problem with this site is the difficulty and inconvenience of adding a post. But I digress. The end of a project is a approaching and I wonder what the fallout will be. Will life continue the same with always another task on the horizon, or will I relax again and focus on side hobbies?

After much consideration and re-evaluation, Twilight Breaking Dawn Part 2 is indeed up there on the top 10 movies for me. The complete left turn it takes from the rest of the slow boring movies is wild and even as a standalone, the movie is an epic war movie with no excess fat.

Accidentally went to a writing club feeling exhausted and not having written all summer. Disastrous depressing results. Note: always show up late after the writing session is over. Why would I got to a writing club to actually write?

I did indeed forget that I made this site the day afterwards. Just been too productive/busy that I have literally no thoughts or conversations to convey other than that for the past week, I've been a very well greased cog in a machine.
The first post! This little basic site took way too long to build.
